metadata.title: Friday, 9th June, 2023
metadata.session: SECOND SESSION OF THE THIRTEENTH ASSEMBLY

parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to establish boarding facilities at some schools in Katombola Parliamentary Constituency in order to increase the number of learners benefiting from the Constituency Development Fund Bursary Scheme;
(b) if so, which schools are earmarked for boarding facilities; and
(a) whether the Government has any plans to construct a communication tower in Chulungoma Ward in Lubansenshi Parliamentary Constituency;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented;
(c) under which mobile network provider the tower will operate;
(d) what the estimated cost of the project is; and
(e) if there are no such plans, why.
(a) whether the Government has any plans to construct a hospital in Lumezi District;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented; and
(c) if there are no such plans, why.
